amendment.description: Amendment sought to prohibit $200,000 from being used for the Greenstone Group project of the Northeast Entrepreneur Fund in Virginia, Minnesota, and reduce the amount of Section 511 of the bill by the same amount.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 10 printed in House Report 111-208 to prohibit $200,000 from being used for the Greenstone Group project of the Northeast Entrepreneur Fund in Virginia, Minnesota, and reduce the amount of Section 511 of the bill by the same amount.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Flake amendment (A010) Failed by recorded vote: 93 - 337 (Roll no. 562).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A010) offered by Mr. Flake.
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Flake amendment (A010) Failed by recorded vote: 93 - 337 (Roll no. 562).
